23.7.  [Haimo] Commentarium in Danielem.
Commentary | Daniel
Manuscripts:
1. Albi, Biblioth√®que municipale 31, f. 61r-72v. saec. ix.
2. Barcelona, Archivo Capitular 64, f. 117rb-124rb. saec. xi.*
3. Turin, Biblioteca Nazionale 531 (D V 17), f. 241v-252v. saec. xii.*
Haimo is probably the author of this commentary, although Remigius of Auxerre or anyone else could also have written it.
